Bought it for 1.63‚Ç¨ during steam black friday sales but I honestly think it's worth the full price.
This game is a masterpiece: the graphics are spectacular even though the game was released in 2011 and it is really well-optimized, getting 190-270fps on a medium-end pc.
Anyways, what really got me was the voice acting and sarcasm: I just love how [spoiler]GLaDOS keeps roasting you for killing her in the previous game[/spoiler] and Wheatley's VA is divine.

If you haven't played the first chapter of the series, don't worry, you'll be able to understand the context through the dialogues, although you might not understand everything that happened in Portal.
